data.actual_result: Keyboard swaps back to alphabet after the :1 and it enters ``:1pp:``
data.expected_result: 100 emoji is entered per norm as ``:100:``
data.short_description: Keyboard improperly swaps from numbers to alphabet when entering an emoji string
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on text entry box - Attempt to enter ``:100:``
